introduction: 一位已经去世的女人复活了，她恳求防腐师埃斯特将自己的遗言转达给女儿。埃斯特意识到这件事意义深远，但是这让她忙于工作无法陪伴家人。她只能努力面对自己选择所带来的后果。When a dead woman Esther comes alive, pleading to relay her last words to her daughter, Esther realizes that she could do something profound in her life. But it renders her busy in work life and makes her unavailable to family. In the end, she grapples with the consequences of such a choice.
